containers.NotFoundPage.pleaseCheckTheAd: Please check the address or contact the support team
containers.SubuserPage.descriptionCreate: The sub-user can log into this database in the same way as the parent user, which can grant privileges to sub-users on layer level. The sub-user name must be globally unique.
containers.SubuserPage.descriptionEdit: Leave password field empty for keeping the current one.
containers.SubuserPage.descriptionCreate: You can choose to create a schema for the new sub-user. The sub-user will be able to create new layers with all privileges inside the schema. The sub-user will also be able to grant privileges on layers inside the schema to other sub-users. You can also create the schema later - just use the name of the sub-user.
containers.SubuserPage.descriptionInheri: Inherit the privileges from another sub-user. If set the new sub-users will have the same privileges as the selected. That is, the selected sub-user will serve as a user group. You will not be able to grant privileges directly to the new sub-user.
Inherit the privileges from another sub-user. Set to blank if you don't want the sub-user to inherit privileges.
